enumeratedValues.name: A_ON_0
enumeratedValues.description: DMA Channel Always ON function is disabled

enumeratedValues.name: A_ON_1
enumeratedValues.description: DMA Channel Always ON function is enabled

enumeratedValues.name: TRIG_0
enumeratedValues.description: Triggering is disabled. If triggering is disabled and ENBL is set, the DMA Channel will simply route the specified source to the DMA channel. (Normal mode)

enumeratedValues.name: TRIG_1
enumeratedValues.description: Triggering is enabled. If triggering is enabled and ENBL is set, the DMA_CH_MUX is in Periodic Trigger mode.
